Update.Changes: Added progress indicator to the first start wizard Added more debug info and logging (to BCUninstaller.log) Added Dutch translation by Jaap Kramer Added Italian translation by Luca Carrabba Added more granual language selection (by country) Changed rating column width to be adjustable to accommodate translations Changed debug mode to be forced ON if compiled as Debug Changed database string for debug build Updated Task Scheduler library Updated Polish translation ...plus many bugfixes and updates to other translations
